Package com.atakmap.android.routes

Interface RoutePlannerInterface2

  • public interface RoutePlannerInterface2
    An interface allowing ATAK plugins to specify automated route planners to be registered with ATAK core, so that they can hook into ATAK's core "Routes" tool as a method for users to automatically plan routes given a start and end point.

    For enhanced route planners registered for a plugin which require more user intervention to create a route, and for which the scheme of generating a route from a start and end point does not make sense, see [ManualRoutePlannerInterface].

    Can be registered/unregistered with ATAK by using RoutePlannerManager.

        Planner requires a network to be used.

      • getRouteGenerationTask

        RouteGenerationTask getRouteGenerationTask​(RouteGenerationTask.RouteGenerationEventListener routeGenerationEventListener)
        Gets the RouteGenerationTask for this planner that is run when initially generating a route.
        Parameters:
        routeGenerationEventListener - The listener that should be associated with this task.
        Returns:
        A RouteGenerationTask for this planner.

      • getOptionsView

        RoutePlannerOptionsView getOptionsView​(android.app.AlertDialog parent)

      • getNavigationOptions

        RoutePlannerOptionsView getNavigationOptions​(android.app.AlertDialog parent)
        Gets any additional options for the planner that are needed at the time of navigating a route.
        Returns:
        Null if the planner does not support additional options, the options otherwise

      • getRouteMethod

        @Nullable
default Route.RouteMethod getRouteMethod()
        Gets the route method associated with this planner. If set (default is null), this planner will only be shown if the user selects the matching route method when planning a route.
